author: trent_vanepps
content:
this will be after the **General Contribution Period** which starts on friday and is planned to run until March 13. 

the **Special Contribution Period** is intended to acommodate two cases: contributions from unique implementations, and unique entropy generation

it will likely use the token/slot assignment approach used by other ceremonies in the past. meaning: you sign up ahead of time, and have a specific slot length (eg. 6 hours) to generate entropy and submit. assigning slots and passing data between participants will be the same as the general period, the Sequencer will handle it
